title: Trello Guides: Help Getting Started With Trello | Trello
content: Getting started with Trello Welcome to Trello! This guide will walk you through everything you need to know about using Trello, from setting up your first project to equipping your team with all of the tools they need to get the job done. Each chapter includes easy to follow steps, tips, and templates that will turn you into a Trello champion in no time. Be a Trello expert in 9 easy steps Learn Trello board basics Create your first project Onboard your team to Trello Integrate Trello with other apps Powerful collaboration features NEW! Activate different views Automate anything in Trello Set permissions and admin controls Learn Trello’s top tips and tricks How to embrace remote work The complete guide to setting up your team for remote work success Try Premium free for 14 days See your work in a whole new way with Trello views. Join over 2,000,000 teams worldwide who are using Trello to get more done. Start with a template Give your team a blueprint for success with Trello templates: copy, customize, and you’ll be collaborating in no time! description: Want to learn how to use Trello? Maybe need a refresher? Check out our Trello getting started guide. It's the ultimate tutorial for all of life's projects.
